title: Get Ingredient Information
description: Use an ingredient id to get all available information about an ingredient, such as its image and supermarket aisle.

unit.Name: unit
unit.Description: The unit for the given amount.

locale.Name: locale
locale.Description: The display name of the returned category, supported is en_US (for American English) and en_GB (for British English).

quota: Calling this endpoint requires 1 point. Learn more about quotas.
